description: Common data models used across features

components.GroupMember: Represents a member of a group in a ticket, who can be a registered customer or a guest.

components.TicketService: Represents a single service within a ticket, linking a service to a customer/guest and a technician.

components.Ticket: The central data model for a ticket, containing all information about a customer's visit, including services, technicians, status, and payment.

rules: A Ticket can be for a 'walk-in' or an 'appointment'.
A Ticket can be for a single customer or a group.
The wait time for a ticket is calculated from its check-in time.
The Ticket model can be serialized to and from JSON.
The fromJson factory is designed to handle both legacy and enhanced ticket formats for backward compatibility.
The Ticket model includes computed properties like `isGroup`, `subtotal`, `involvedTechnicianIds`, and `allServicesCompleted`.
The `copyWith` method allows for creating a new Ticket instance with updated values.

components.Employee: A comprehensive Freezed data model representing an employee with all their attributes, capabilities, and work-related information.

components.EmployeeRole: An enum defining the different roles an employee can have (admin, manager, technician, receptionist, staff).

components.EmployeeStatus: An enum defining the different statuses an employee can have (active, inactive, onBreak, vacation, terminated).

components.EmployeeRoleX: Extension on EmployeeRole providing string conversion methods.

components.EmployeeTechnicianCompat: Extension on Employee providing Technician-like properties for backward compatibility.

rules: Uses Freezed for immutable data model with automatic JSON serialization.
Supports secure social security number field (encrypted/protected).
Tracks clock-in/clock-out state and timing information.
Includes work-related metrics: hours this week/month, commission rate.
Supports department assignment and location-based organization.
Includes service preferences: can accept walk-ins/appointments flags.
Integrates with employee capabilities system for service assignments.
Provides profile image URL support for avatar display.
Includes flexible permissions system via Map<String, dynamic>.
PIN authentication support through pinHash field.
Status and role enums provide type-safe employee classification.
EmployeeTechnicianCompat extension provides compatibility with legacy Technician interface.
Computed properties: isAvailable (clocked in + active), fullName, displayNameOrFullName.
Compact display properties: compactName (FirstName L.), initials (FL).
Default values ensure consistent initialization: active status, zero commission, etc.
Required fields enforce data integrity: id, names, contact info, role, location.
Created/updated timestamps for audit tracking.
JSON serialization support for API communication and data persistence.
